org.springframework.data.repository.history

接口 RevisionRepository<T,ID,N extends Number & Comparable<N>>

  • 所有超级接口:
    Repository<T,ID>

    @NoRepositoryBean
public interface RevisionRepository<T,ID,N extends Number & Comparable<N>>
extends Repository<T,ID>
    A repository which can access entities held in a variety of Revisions.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Optional<org.springframework.data.history.Revision<N,T>> findLastChangeRevision(ID id)
      Returns the revision of the entity it was last changed in.
      Optional<org.springframework.data.history.Revision<N,T>> findRevision(ID id, N revisionNumber)
      Returns the entity with the given ID in the given revision number.
      org.springframework.data.history.Revisions<N,T> findRevisions(ID id)
      Returns all Revisions of an entity with the given id.
      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<org.springframework.data.history.Revision<N,T>> findRevisions(ID id, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Returns a Page of revisions for the entity with the given id.

        Optional<org.springframework.data.history.Revision<N,T>> findLastChangeRevision(ID id)

        id - must not be null.
        返回:

        参数:
        id - must not be null.
        返回:

      • findRevisions

        org.springframework.data.domain.Page<org.springframework.data.history.Revision<N,T>> findRevisions(ID id,
                                                                                                   org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Returns a Page of revisions for the entity with the given id. Note, that it's not guaranteed that implementations have to support sorting by all properties.
        参数:
        id - must not be null.
        pageable -
        返回:
        另请参阅:
        RevisionSort

      • findRevision

        Optional<org.springframework.data.history.Revision<N,T>> findRevision(ID id,
                                                                      N revisionNumber)
        Returns the entity with the given ID in the given revision number.
        参数:
        id - must not be null.
        revisionNumber - must not be null.
        返回:
        the Revision of the entity with the given ID in the given revision number.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.12
